Translations.Text: Allaha balalenah he ibalisa, tomara ki halo ye tumi sejadakaridera antarbhukta hate sbikrta hale na
Balalah ami emana na'i ye, ekajana manabake sejada karaba, yake apani paca kardama theke tairi thanathane bisuska mati dbara srsti karechena.
Allaha balalenah tabe tumi ekhana theke bera haye ya'o. Tumi bitarita.
Ebam tomara prati n'yaya bicarera dina paryanta abhisampata.
Se balalah he amara palanakarta, apani amake punarut'thana dibasa paryanta abakasa dina.
Allaha balalenah tomake abakasa deya hala.
Se'i abadharita samaya upasthita ha'oyara dina paryanta.
Se balalah he amara palanakarta, apani yemana amake patha bhrasta karechena, ami'o tadera saba'ike prthibite nana saundarye akrsta karaba ebam tadera saba'ike patha bhrastha kare deba.
Apanara manonita bandadera byatita.
Allaha balalenah eta ama paryanta soja patha.
Yara amara banda, tadera upara tomara kona ksamata ne'i; kintu pathabhrantadera madhya theke yara tomara pathe cale.
Tadera sabara nirdharita sthana hacche jahannama.
Era satati daraja ache. Pratyeka darajara jan'ye eka ekati prthaka dala ache.
Niscaya khodabhirura bagana o nirjharinisahuhe thakabe.
Bala habeh egulote nirapatta o santi sahakare prabesa kara.
Tadera antare ye krodha chila, ami ta dura kare deba. Tara bha'i bha'iyera mata samana-samani asane basabe.
Sekhane tadera mote'i kasta habe na ebam tara sekhana theke bahiskrta habe na.
Apani amara bandaderake janiye dina ye, ami atyanta ksamasila dayalu.
Ebam iha'o ye, amara sasti'i yantranadayaka sasti.
Apani taderake ibrahimera mehamanadera abastha suniye dina.
